questions.question: So if you figure out, if you look at it today, where does the embarrassment come from?
How do you know you're going to deal with somebody that's not going to rip you off?
So if those people out there are wondering why Bitcoin is going at what 44k today?
People a hundred years from now will be laughing, wait, it was that low back then?
Are you, and I apologize for this question, are you ever worried for your life, for your wellbeing?
How will this time be written about in the history books and react to that?
